sections.label: Part I
sections.title: Section 179 Election
summary: Capture property elected for section 179 expensing.

fields.label: Property description
fields.help: Describe the property eligible for the section 179 election.

fields.label: Date placed in service
fields.help: Enter the date the property was first placed in service.

fields.label: Cost or basis
fields.help: Enter the cost or basis of the property.

fields.label: Elected section 179 amount
fields.help: Enter the amount elected for section 179 expensing.

fields.label: Limit notes
fields.help: Add any notes about section 179 limits or business use restrictions.

sections.label: Part II
sections.title: Special Depreciation Allowance
summary: Record bonus depreciation or special allowance amounts.

fields.label: Claim special allowance
fields.help: Check if bonus depreciation applies for the year.

fields.label: Special allowance amount
fields.help: Enter the amount of bonus depreciation claimed.

fields.label: Notes
fields.help: Explain the property or rationale for the special allowance.

sections.label: Part III
sections.title: MACRS Depreciation
summary: Track property subject to MACRS depreciation.
Use one entry per material asset group as needed.

fields.label: Property description
fields.help: Describe the property subject to MACRS.

fields.label: Date placed in service
fields.help: Enter the date the property was placed in service.

fields.label: Cost or other basis
fields.help: Enter the cost or basis used for depreciation.

fields.label: Method
fields.help: Describe the depreciation method used (e.g., 200% DB, SL).

fields.label: Recovery period (years)
fields.help: Enter the recovery period in years.

fields.label: Convention
fields.help: Enter the applicable convention (e.g., half-year, mid-quarter).

fields.label: Depreciation amount
fields.help: Enter the depreciation amount for this property.

sections.label: Part V
sections.title: Listed Property
summary: Capture listed property usage and depreciation.

fields.label: Property description
fields.help: Describe the listed property (vehicle, equipment, etc.).

fields.label: Business use percentage
fields.help: Enter the business-use percentage for the property.

fields.label: Cost or basis
fields.help: Enter the cost or basis of the listed property.

fields.label: Depreciation amount
fields.help: Enter the depreciation amount for the listed property.

fields.label: Usage notes
fields.help: Document business use logs or substantiation notes.

sections.label: Part VI
sections.title: Amortization
summary: Record amortization for intangibles or startup costs.

fields.label: Description of costs
fields.help: Describe the costs being amortized.

fields.label: Amortization start date
fields.help: Enter the date amortization began.

fields.label: Amount or basis
fields.help: Enter the amount or basis being amortized.

fields.label: Amortization period (months)
fields.help: Enter the amortization period in months.

fields.label: Amortization amount
fields.help: Enter the amortization amount for the year.
